category: Product > materials, treatments and surfaces (including paneling)
description_html:
Trapezoid by CUTTOFFS is using 5 inch wide half hexagons made from 3 different colors of Reclaimed White Oak. Each piece is cut by hand and then assembled on a plank. The wood is surface sanded, but left unfinished to maintain the natural patina of the wood.

CUTTOFFS’ wood walls are nothing like the pressed wood panels in your grandmother’s rumpus room back in the 1960’s and 1970’s. The company puts a strong focus on innovative and unique designs and offers modern and rustic options from reclaimed wood planks to a variety of 3 dimensional patterns. Trapezoid is the newest addition to the eclectic wood wall collection by Cuttoffs.
